mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Delivery VALUES( delivery_seq.nextval, #{invoice_no}, #{emp_code}, #{store_order_detail_no}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM ( SELECT d.invoice_no, d.store_order_detail_no, d.delivery_date, e.emp_name, d.emp_code FROM Delivery d, Employee e, Branch b WHERE d.emp_code = e.emp_code AND e.branch_no = b.branch_no AND e.branch_no = #{session_branch_no} ORDER BY d.delivery_no DESC) t1) t2 WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{currPage}-1)*5+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{currPage}*5

SELECT d.invoice_no, d.store_order_detail_no, to_date(d.delivery_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+3 as delivery_date, d.emp_code, e.emp_name, t1.branch_name, t1.branch_no, t1.branch_address, t1.branch_phone, t1.product_name FROM Delivery d, Store_order_detail s, Employee e, ( SELECT s.store_order_detail_no, b.branch_no, b.branch_name, b.branch_address, b.branch_phone, p.product_no, p.product_name FROM Store_order_detail s, Store_order_reservation r, Employee e, Branch b, Product p WHERE s.store_order_res_code = r.store_order_res_code AND r.emp_code = e.emp_code AND e.branch_no = b.branch_no AND p.product_no = s.product_no AND s.store_order_detail_no = #{store_order_detail_no}) t1 WHERE d.store_order_detail_no = s.store_order_detail_no AND e.emp_code = d.emp_code AND t1.store_order_detail_no = d.store_order_detail_no AND d.store_order_detail_no = #{store_order_detail_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Delivery d, Employee e, Branch b WHERE d.emp_code = e.emp_code AND e.branch_no = b.branch_no AND e.branch_no = #{branch_no}
